t: Recovery Mode AMAZON Fire
s: Recovery mode is a menu with a lot of useful functions. Depending on the version, modes will be different. In this mode you can erase all data from your AMAZON Fire or only wipe a cache. You can turn on Fastboot mode or Bootloader mode from this menu, if it is available.

t: Factory Reset Your Fire Tablet - Amazon Customer Service
